message: Has anyone used this?  I just stumbled across it and it looks awesome.
check out the one I created here:

I've used it a bunch so far :D I had some tweets flying around because I couldn't get some magical key thing working on windows. Then @fnichol helped out (I think it's in the issues thing). It's really awesome for getting stuff created quickly.
Totally.  I wanted to mess around with mongoid so I came across it looking for guides on setting up a mongoid based project.  With this it was super easy.
I also really like seeing how other people bootstrap their rails apps. Like snowflakes...

Yep, one of the best railsrumble 2010 projects, IMO. I had written up a bunch of addon recipes to help with my project generation (https://github.com/fnichol/rails-template-recipes) but after @mbleigh re factored it I've had to start migrating (https://github.com/fnichol/rails_wizard). Super awesome that there is a command line gem now too.
